article.author: G Adventures
article.title: Travel Better
article.lead: Just how our world needs our best right now, when we get to the other side - and we will - it will need us to travel our best too.

article.author: Manulife Insurance
article.title: Malcolm - Saved by Travel Insurance
article.lead: Watch Malcolm tell his tale of how he was saved by travel insurance when things went wrong, and how Manulife was there to help.
